known_issues: Runtime error in product/admin products section: <Select.Item /> has an empty string value prop, causing Select to crash and product section to not work

existing_features.title: Fix the runtime crash "A <Select.Item /> must have a value prop that is not an empty string" by removing/replacing any <SelectItem value=""> usage in the product catalog filters and ensuring the UI still supports an "All"/"no filter" state without using an empty string SelectItem value.

Audit the admin products page and any other product-related pages/components that render Shadcn <SelectItem /> options, and ensure no <SelectItem /> is rendered with an empty-string value (including dynamically-generated items where the underlying value might be ''). Add guards so that empty/invalid option values are filtered out or mapped to a non-empty sentinel value.
